00030 /// \brief
00031 /// The FdoIMultiCurveString class is a multi-CurveString collection Geometry type.
00032 /// The curves contained here do not have to
00033 /// be contiguous, nor spatially interact in any other way.
00034 class FdoIMultiCurveString : public FdoIGeometricAggregateAbstract
00035 {
00036 public:
00037 
00038     /// \brief
00039     /// Gets a CurveString at the given zero-based index.
00040     /// 
00041     /// \param index 
00042     /// Input Zero-based index in the object's list of curve strings.
00043     /// 
00044     /// \return
00045     /// Returns a CurveString
00046     /// 
00047     FDO_GEOM_API virtual FdoICurveString* GetItem(
00048         FdoInt32 index) const = 0;
00049 
00050 protected:
00051 
00052     /// \brief
00053     /// Constructs a default instance.
00054     /// 
00055     /// \return
00056     /// Returns nothing
00057     /// 
00058     FDO_GEOM_API FdoIMultiCurveString() {};
00059 
00060     /// \brief
00061     /// Default destructor.
00062     /// 
00063     /// \return
00064     /// Returns nothing
00065     /// 
00066     FDO_GEOM_API virtual ~FdoIMultiCurveString() {};
00067 
00068 };
00069 #endif
